body: For the future: The GTest equivalent of `REQUIRES` is `ASSERT*`  and then instead of `ASSERT_EQ(x, true)` you want `ASSERT_TRUE(x)`
body_html: For the future: The GTest equivalent of REQUIRES is ASSERT* and then instead of ASSERT_EQ(x, true) you want ASSERT_TRUE(x)
body_text: For the future: The GTest equivalent of REQUIRES is ASSERT*  and then instead of ASSERT_EQ(x, true) you want ASSERT_TRUE(x)
